amendment.description: To clarify certain provisions relating to the natural gas pipeline authorized in the Denali National Park and Preserve.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3308 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2146) To clarify certain provisions relating to the natural gas pipeline authorized in the Denali National Park and Preserve.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3308 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2953.
